text: @DrRPNishank @NewIndianXpress @PrabhuChawla @narendramodi @AmitShah @PMOIndia @HMOIndia @HRDMinistry @mygovindia @transformIndia @PIB_India @MIB_India @DDNewslive Respected sir, my neighbour is infected by coronavirus and my area is seal. in this situation I cannot focusing in study. Sir I humble requesting you please postpone neet and jee #postponeneet2020 #postponejee2020 #StudentsLivesMatter #HealthOverExams
